0: f ttt f ttt f ttt f ttt f ttt f ttt ||ftt ftt ftt ftt ftt ftt ftf ftf ||ftt ftt ftt ftt ftt ftt tft tft tft

Type the T key by reaching your index finger up from the F key. If this feels like a long stretch, you may need to elevate your wrists/palms off the keyboard. Keeping your wrists up is an important ergonomic technique, helping with both speed and injury prevention!
1: k lll k lll k lll k lll k lll k lll ||kll kll kll kll kll kll klk klk klk || kll kll kll kll kll kll lkl lkl lkl
Time for a new finger! The L key is typed with the ring finger on your right hand.
